meta.title: Ancient of Days
meta.comment:
Gary Sadler & Jamie Harvill
(c)1992 Integrity's Praise! Music

lines.text: Blessing and honour, glory and power
Be unto the Ancient of Days
From ev'ry nation, all of creation
Bow before the Ancient of Days
Ev'ry tongue in heaven and earth
Ev'ry knee shall bow at your throne
You will be exalted, O God
And your kingdom shall not pass away
Your kingdom shall reign over all the earth
Sing unto the Ancient of Days
For none shall compare to your matchless worth
Sing unto the Ancient of Days
